author: timw
msg: Always calculate path of resource to be served relative to the context root.
This invokes the standard protection of WEB-INF and META-INF directories.
This is a breaking change for the unofficial use of DefaultServlet to remount the webapp base under a new path.

author: niallp
msg: Rename "test" profile to "test-distribution" and change JUnit version in Ant build be inline with pom.xml

author: erwan
msg: title was missing in renderDisplayField macro
